item.description:
Energy Healing Open House

Join us for a one hour Taoist yoga & meditation with light stretching at 6:30 pm. This event is part of our Energy Healing Open House which runs from 3 to 9 pm. The Open House features various energy healing modalities throughout the day. All events are FREE except community acupunture treatments. Holistic health practiioners and instructors will guide participants through the following energy healing sessions:

• 3-5:30 pm --
Community Acupuncture Treatments $30 (or bring a friend for the price of one)
• 5:30-6 pm --
Acupuncture & Health, a talk by Dr. Chul Han, L. AC. DIPL. AC.
• 6-6:30 pm --
Yoga for Back Care, demo by Madeleine Hexter, certified yoga instructor
• 6:30-7:30 pm --
SunDo Taoist Yoga & Breathing Meditaion, class led by SunDo instructors
• 7:30-8 pm --
Energy Healing & The Breath – a talk by Christine Ucich, SunDo instructor
• 8-9 pm --
Sound Healing Therapy, hands-on sessions and group meditation with Tibetan bowls

Come for all or just part of the Open House! Meet practioners who will be available to answer questions. Refreshments will be served. Take advantage of special prices for regular classes or healing sessions if purchased that day!

A full description of events is available at www.sundo.org/events. For more information, contact the SunDo Taoist Center at (860) 523-5260 or email questions@sundo.org.
item.name: Energy Healing Events and Fall Open House
